overview_of_class: Introduction to fundamental mathematical ideas - such as sets, functions, equivalence relations, and cardinal numbers - and basic techniques of writing proofs.  Students may not receive credit for 300 without prior departmental consent after taking 320-1, 321-1, 330-1, or 331-1. Prerequisite: 240.
name: Foundations of Higher Mathematics
subject: MATH
